Get Started

Mission

Building a humane package workflow for COBOL teams

CobolDepot keeps legacy systems healthy by modernizing how COBOL dependencies are shared, documented, and searched. We blend static-first docs with curated package metadata so that mainframe engineers get the same experience web developers expect—fast previews, reliable installations, and transparent governance.

Maintainers

Led by the CobolDepot Core team. We coordinate via GitHub Projects and quarterly planning calls.

Roadmap

  • Alpha: static docs + package catalog
  • Beta: authenticated publishing workflow
  • GA: verified maintainers + automated scans

Deployment

Cloudflare Pages deploys on every merge to main, giving edge-cached docs and instant rollbacks.

© 2025 CobolDepot. Built for mainframe teams.

Cloudflare Pages deploys from main. Preview builds are created for every pull request to validate Docs, Packages, and Search updates before release.
